using namespace std;
#define lli long long int
#define ulli unsigned long long int
#define in(t) scanf("%d",&t)
#define inlf(t) scanf("%lf",&t)
#define inl(t) scanf("%ld",&t)
#define inll(t) scanf("%lld",&t)
#define inlu(t) scanf("%llu",&t)
#define MOD 1000000007

int main()
{
    lli n,k,m,temp;
    int t;
    in(t);
    while(t--)
    {
    temp=0;
    inll(n);
    inll(k);
    inll(m);
    if(k==1)
    {
    printf("%lld\n",n);
    continue;
    }
    temp=n;
    while(n%k==0 && m!=0)
    {
    m--;
    n/=k;
    }
    if(m%2)
    printf("%lld\n",n*k);
    else
    printf("%lld\n",n);
    }
    return 0;
}
